section.title: What is Pingus?
section.p: Pingus is free Lemmingstm- puzzle game covered the GPL. It features currently 77 playable levels and runs a wide variety of operating systems (Linux, Windows, MacOSX, etc.)

section.title: The Game
section.p: Pingus has started at the end of 1998 with the simple goal create a Free (as in freedom, not as in free beer) Lemmingstm clone. The Free means you get sources and are allowed and encouraged to change and them. You basically get everything that I used to create game. In the years it has grown than quite a bit over original goal and become something more than just a clone, have original artwork, a built-in level editor, new actions, multiplayer and a few other features.

If you don't know Lemmingstm, here comes a introduction. It is a puzzle game developed in by Design. The player takes command in the game of a bunch small animals and has to guide them through levels. Since animals walk on their own, the player can only influence them giving them commands, like build a bridge, dig a hole or redirect all animals in the direction. The goal of each level is to reach the exit, for this multiple combination of commands are necessary. game is presented in a 2D site view. For more information might want to visit one of the visit Lemmingstm fanpages on the net.

While Pingus is based on the idea of Lemmingstm, however doesn't try to be an exact clone, it has included a ideas of its own, like the worldmap or secret levels, might be familiar from games the Super Mario World and Nintendo games. It has also a few new actions, like the which weren't presented in the original game. To get impression of the look of the Pingus game you might want to a look at some screenshots.
